groups.name: env.printer
groups.description: Configuration properties for the Environment Printer starter.

properties.name: env.printer.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the environment printer functionality. When disabled, no environment variables will be printed at startup and the actuator endpoint will not be available.

properties.name: env.printer.endpoint-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the actuator endpoint for environment variables. When disabled, only startup logging will occur.
